name: Dice Of Holding
description:
Your parties rogue has locked away some of your precious items inside their magical die, or rather their set of magical dice. Like matryoshka the next die in the set is locked inside the previous die. You have to tilt and rotate the current dice to guide the next one out of the exit hole. Try your best to reach your items locked in the deepest levels.

Controls: 

Tilting/Rotating/Movement: WASD / ARROW KEYS.

Restart/Reroll: R key

Main Menu: M key

Submission for the GMTK GameJam2022. First time participating in  a game jam and my first original game that I've actually published. Now it's about 3am so I'm going to submit this to the jam and then go to bed. I'll fix the page up tomorrow.
